definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: That's according to a new AP Ipsos poll.
sentences.chinese: 這是根據最新的美聯社依普索民意調查得出的結論。
這次民意調查由誰資助？

sentences.english: A new poll of historians just came out.And the poll has named former President George W.
sentences.chinese: 對歷史學家做的一項新的民意調查剛剛公佈出來。

sentences.english: How can people know the contact information of each survey?
sentences.chinese: 巿民大衆如何得知每次民意調查的樣本資料？

sentences.english: Is this a legitimate survey organization?
sentences.chinese: 它是正當的民意調查機構嗎？

sentences.english: Exit polls in Norway’s general elections suggest the Labor-led coalition has been re-elected.
sentences.chinese: 挪威大選民意調查顯示，工黨領導的聯盟再次當選。

sentences.english: And the Lib Dems got all this despite flopping at the polls.
sentences.chinese: 而且自由民主黨在民意調查中是侮辱性的失敗了。

sentences.english: Egypt's first post-revolutionary polls are due to open on November 28th.
sentences.chinese: 埃及革命後第一個民意調查將於11月28日開始。

sentences.english: Who else do they poll for?
S. public opinion survey public-opinion surveys show the decillion supports declining support for the war in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美國民意調查表明對於阿富汗戰爭的支持率下滑。

sentences.english: Daria:Have you ever participated in a public poll?
The polls were Sudan's first multi-party elections in 24 years.
sentences.chinese: 本次民意調查是蘇丹24年內第一次多黨制選舉。

sentences.english: U. S. public-opinion surveys show declining support for the war in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美國的民意調查顯示對阿富汗戰爭的支持率正在下滑。

sentences.english: Both the Tories and their Liberal Democratic appendage have plummeted in the opinion polls.
sentences.chinese: 保守黨和自由民主黨的在民意調查中都已急劇下跌。

sentences.english: The public needs to possess a healthy skepticism about polls.
sentences.chinese: 公衆應當對民意調查持健康的懷疑態度。

definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
